channel.title: [pi]auto cache downloader?[pi]
channel.description:
ok, i put the code in for the auto cache dowloader in and i get no errors, basically it put everything in for the cache downloader to work, i put my uppit link in where its supposed to and it ends with .zip but when i run the client i get Error Loading... Please report!
and help???? and no errors when i compile either??

item.title: [pi]auto cache downloader?[pi]
item.dc:creator: @Aceron4 Aceron4
item.description:
@Aceron4 wrote:

Dont use a site like uppit to upload your files to (It never really works anyway). Use dropbox.com or another free file hosting site (not megaupload, mediafire, etc). But still … I would highly recommend using DropBox.

PS: also remember to zip the contents of your cache folder and not the cache folder itself.

Read full topic
